post.text: It's not complicated: We need our economy to work for everyone, not just the rich or the well-connected.

comment.author: Justina
comment.text: Hillary Clinton knows the needs of the US people. She says three transcendental points: education, good jobs and clean energy. In conclusion her goal is a good quality of life for the entire population of the United States of North America.

replies.author: Janae
replies.text: Pretty sure it is the United States of America

replies.author: Kurtis
replies.text: "Hillary Clinton, she'll say anything and change nothing." - Barack Obama
